channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Feel Good Beauty Finale
channel.desc: Make some time for you and let's feel good, with QVC Beauty, featuring everything from colourful make-up to must-have skincare and more to make you smile.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Feel Good Beauty Finale

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: The Big Deal Morning Show
channel.desc: Start your week with a first look at some of the most exciting limited time offers at QVC across home, garden, beauty and fashion in The Big Deal Morning Show.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Fashion Sale
channel.desc: A great time to fill up your wardrobe with amazing bargains - from this year's finest fashions to tried-and-tested classics.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: FitFlop Footwear
channel.desc: Discover FitFlop, which brings you a range of bio-mechanically engineered sandals, trainers and more that support you from the ground up, so you can feel comfortable and look great all day.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: The Lunchtime Show
channel.desc: Join us and our great panel of guests at lunchtime as they enjoy a chat and share a selection of fantastic products from top brands on QVC.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: The Jewellery Box
channel.desc: Indulge yourself in our collection of fine, exquisite jewellery. Each piece in our glamorous selection epitomises the height of luxury. Go on, you deserve it.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Up to 50% off MarlaWynne Sale
channel.desc: Transform your wardrobe with up to 50% off in the MarlaWynne Sale at QVC. Discover chic, versatile pieces at amazing prices and elevate your style for less.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Feel Good Beauty Finale
channel.desc: Make some time for you and let's feel good, with QVC Beauty, featuring everything from colourful make-up to must-have skincare and more to make you smile.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Molton Brown
channel.desc: Awaken your senses with fragrance experts Molton Brown, London's bath, body and beauty connoisseurs since 1973. Indulge in exquisitely crafted blends brought to you by Molton Brown, London.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Margaret Dabbs London
channel.desc: Pamper your hands and feet with innovative hand and footcare formulas from international podiatrist and foot expert Margaret Dabbs.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Feel Good Beauty with Anne Klein
channel.desc: Make some time for you and let's feel good, with QVC beauty, featuring Anne Klein. It's all about life's little luxuries with some well-deserved time spent on you.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Laura Geller Make-up
channel.desc: Laura Geller is a renowned make-up artist, teacher and working mother and the creative force behind one of the most successful make-up studios in New York. Join us to explore her superb range.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Travel with Rock Luggage
channel.desc: Don't check in for that summer getaway until you've seen our travel solutions from Rock Luggage. This stylish and practical collection of suitcases and travel bags will have you jet-setting in style.

channel.desc: With specially chosen products from across the QVC range, there's something for everyone in the QVC Selection.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Accessories Sale
channel.desc: Presenting a spectacular selection of gorgeous shoes, handbags and many more accessories from brands you'll adore, all at unbelievable prices.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Denim & Co Sale
channel.desc: Join us to see terrific bargains from Denim & Co.'s clothing range, offering trend-focused pieces combined with timeless style and chic choices for your smart or casual looks.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: The Lunchtime Show
channel.desc: Join us and our great panel of guests at lunchtime as they enjoy a chat and share a selection of fantastic products from top brands on QVC.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: My Hair Doctor
channel.desc: Join us for My Hair Doctor from Guy Parsons, an industry professional whose knowledge of hair and scalp health, plus his hairdressing skills has enabled him to create this premium haircare range.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: M. Asam Beauty Is Our Tradition
channel.desc: Enjoy younger looking skin with M.Asam, an effective skincare range that blends innovative technique and ingredients including grape oil, to target fine lines and wrinkles.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Monsoon Sale
channel.desc: From Portobello Road to household name, the Monsoon fashion collection has earned its place in the nation's wardrobes. Join us to discover unmissable Sale offers on fantastic pieces from the range.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Floral Street Fragrance
channel.desc: Dive into the essence of modern British fragrance with Floral Street. Founded by beauty powerhouse Michelle Feeney, explore scents that champion eco-responsibility at their core.

channel.title: Nina Leonard
